question-text: Answer the questions in complete sentences.

set1.question-item-text: Why are communication skills important in our social dealings?
What does ‘the black sheep of the family’ mean?
What kind of people are nocturnal?
How is electricity generated from the sun?

What do these lines mean?

You cannot tell its magic

By the way the building looks,

set2.question-item-text: What is the function of the ozone layer?
What is a major cause of ill health?
How do we feel when we cannot fulfil our wants or needs?
What type of person is commonly referred to as a greenhorn?

What do these lines mean?

Blest, who can unconcern'dly find

Hours, days and years slide soft away

set3.question-item-text: Why do advertisers choose bright and cheerful colours?
What has lead to a more diverse community in the 21<sup>st</sup> Century World?
What did Helen do to other children?
Why should the goals of schools and universities include the promotion of effective communication?

What do these lines mean?

It looks like any building

When you pass it on the street,

set4.question-item-text: Apart from home, where do children learn or acquire manners?
How can AI assist teachers in the field of education?
What are examples of fossil fuels and what are they used for?
What did Mrs. Keller notice shortly after the doctor left?

What do these lines mean?

Thus let me live, unseen, unknown;

Thus unlamented let me die;
